title: Did Tom Brady have a record because he paid me to say, "I'm going to Disney World"?
subtitle: This is the original story of the famous post-Super Bowl logo.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: After Super Bowl LV on February 7, 2021, Disney paid Tom Brady to say a copy of "I'm going to Disney World" or "I'm going to Disneyland" four times -- more than any professional athlete.
